{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = RangeMax Wireless PCI Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/WPN311 |dl = http://support.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/872 |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Netgear |model = WPN311 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = V1H2 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = |if = PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PY3WG311TV3 |icid = 4054A-WG311TV3 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:0F:B5,00:1E:2A |chip1 = Atheros;AR2414; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = WLG-1202 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/17/2004 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is clearly a [[Cameo WLG-1202|'''Cameo''' WLG-1202]]. "NETGEAR" and "32-bit Wireless PCI Adapter Rev.A3" (as well as a large bit of FCC compliance text, some other stuff, the FCC ID, and the IC ID) is silkscreened on the board. A label on the back of the board identifies the device as a WPN311 V1H2. This device is presumed to use AR2414 based on the specifications. The FCC pictures of the card also indicate that is indeed an AR2414. ==Links of Interest== [http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/727946 A whirlpool.net.au user described a WPN311 card labeled with Rev. A3 on the back] [http://debianforum.de/forum/viewtopic.php?f=30&t=134648 ath5k dump (copied below)] 
 dmesg | grep ath5k
[   25.378627] ath5k 0000:00:0b.0: PCI INT A -> Link[LNKA] -> GSI 10 (level, low) -> IRQ 10
[   25.390695] ath5k 0000:00:0b.0: registered as 'phy0'
[   26.271140] ath5k phy0: Atheros AR2414 chip found (MAC: 0x79, PHY: 0x45)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
